cu.explanation_en: Setting the ciphering algorithm to the unknown enum 'nea9' will cause negotiation failure during the security negotiation phase and connection establishment rejection.

du.explanation_en: Setting hw_log_level to an invalid enum value 'invalid_level' will cause hardware logging configuration failure as it does not match the allowed log levels.
du.explanation_zh: 將 hw_log_level 設定為無效的枚舉值 'invalid_level' 會導致硬體日誌配置失敗，因為它不符合允許的日誌級別。
